Title: Cry for Help
Writer: Rebecca Sugar (creator), Joseph D. Johnston, Jeff Liu, Matt Burnett (story), Ben Levin (story), Rebecca Sugar (story), Ian Jones-Quartey (story), Kat Morris (story)
Actors: Zach Callison, Michaela Dietz, Estelle, Alexia Khadime
Plot: Steven's favorite TV show gets interrupted by a magical disturbance. / Steven, Greg and Garnet go on a road trip.
